t: Health in Ayurveda means the body is free of toxins; the mind is at peace; the emotions are calm and happy; wastes are efficiently eliminated; the organs function normally; and the immune system is ...
h: Health in Ayurveda means the body is free of toxins; the mind is at peace; the emotions are calm and happy; wastes are efficiently eliminated; the organs function normally; and the immune system is strong.
